[Home](./index.md) &gt; [state-auth](./state-auth.md) &gt; [AccessToken](./state-auth.accesstoken.md)

## AccessToken interface

Represents a token received by an external api that authorizes the user for a certain time period

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AccessToken 
```

## Remarks

The token will be appended to the authorization header of every request

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [expiresIn](./state-auth.accesstoken.expiresin.md) | number | The number of seconds before the token expires |
|  [token](./state-auth.accesstoken.token.md) | string | The token value |
